# Ignore macOS system files
.DS_Store

# Ignore Visual Studio Code files
.vscode/

# Ignore Unity generated files
/[Ll]ibrary/
[Ll]ibrary/
Library/
/[Tt]emp/
/[Oo]bj/
/[Bb]uild/
/[Bb]uilds/
/[Ll]ogs/
/[Uu]serData/
/[Pp]ackages/
/[Ii]mport/
/[Mm]emoryCaptures/
/[Tt]estAssemblies/
/[Bb]ackups/
/[Mm]iniWebServer/
/[Aa]utoBuild/
/[Bb]uilds/

# Ignore MonoDevelop generated files
/[Aa]ssets/[Bb]in/
/[Aa]ssets/[Oo]bj/
/[Aa]ssets/[Ss]treamingAssets/
/[Aa]ssets/Plugins/Editor/
[Aa]ssets/Standard\ Assets/
[Aa]ssets/ProStandard\ Assets/
[Aa]ssets/Plugins/Android/

# Ignore build products
/[Bb]uilds/

# Ignore custom build settings
/[Bb]uilds/AssetBundles/
/[Bb]uilds/Web/
/[Bb]uilds/iOS/
/[Bb]uilds/Android/
/[Bb]uilds/Windows/

# Ignore asset meta data
*.asset
